ygData.messageBody:
> While what you did may have been warranted, isn't purposely dropping a train
> on someone a bannable offense?

Bannable or not, do you really want to lower yourself to
their level? Ignore, Petition, Go Elsewhere. Too bad there
isn't an Enemies list to match the Friends list -- "if anyone
on this list appears, inform me so I can take appropriately
evasive action" -- with the limit being, "hey Sony/Verant, if we
the following <list> keep seeing <badguy> in the game, we are
going to stop paying our $10/month. Him or us, decide."

Presenting a business with a clear $-vs-$ decision is often a
quick way to encourage direct action.

Only problem is, if you do this, you have to be ready to actually
vacate the game, or the threat has no power.
